description: ExpressionWarning is a warning information that targets a specific expression.

fieldRef.description: The path to the field that refers the expression. For example, the reference to the expression of the first item of validations is "spec.validations[0].expression"

warning.description: The content of type checking information in a human-readable form. Each line of the warning contains the type that the expression is checked against, followed by the type check error from the compiler.
